content.title: Rehabilitation Assistance- Haryana Silicosis Board
content.details: The scheme 'Rehabilitation Assistance' is implemented by the Haryana Labour Welfare Board, Government of Haryana. Under this scheme, a one-time assistance of ₹5,00,000/- will be given to silicosis-affected workers upon confirmation by the Silicosis Diagnosis Board. In the event of the worker's death before receiving the rehabilitation assistance after confirmation of silicosis, the assistance shall be payable to the widow or widower if the worker was married, or to one of the living parents if the worker was unmarried.
benefits: One-time assistance of ₹5,00,000/- for silicosis-affected workers upon confirmation by the Silicosis Diagnosis Board.
Assistance payable to widow/widower if the worker was married or to one of the living parents if the worker was unmarried in case of death before receiving assistance.
eligibility: Any worker confirmed by the Silicosis Diagnosis Board, Haryana as suffering from silicosis.
The worker should be registered with the Haryana Silicosis Board.
The worker should be employed in a factory or at a construction site.
content.application_process: To avail of the benefits of the scheme, the eligible applicant may visit the nearest Antyodaya Kendra and fill up the application form.
documents_required: Medical Report (X-Ray, CT Scan, Medical Prescription, Any Other)

faqs.question: Who is eligible for assistance under this scheme?
faqs.answer: Any worker confirmed by the Silicosis Diagnosis Board, Haryana as suffering from silicosis is eligible for the assistance.

faqs.question: What happens if the worker dies before receiving the assistance?
faqs.answer: If the worker dies before receiving the assistance, the amount will be payable to the widow or widower if married, or to one of the living parents if unmarried.

faqs.question: Is silicosis a notifiable disease in Haryana?
faqs.answer: Yes, silicosis is a notifiable disease in Haryana under the Factories Act, 1948, and the Building and Other Construction Workers (RE & CS) Act, 1996.

faqs.question: How can a worker apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: The worker should visit the official website of the Labour Department Haryana to apply for the scheme.
